hero.heading: The #1 Low-code Marketplace
hero.subheading: Elegant, low-code, community-driven blocks that save your company time and money.
hero.content: Rockin' Blocks is the leading component marketplace that brings developers and corporations together to solve technical problems quickly with built-in support.

cta.heading: Build with your favorite technologies
cta.content: Low-code doesn't have to mean a bad developer experience. Work with the libraries your team knows and loves.

features.heading: Low-Code Enterprise Solutions
features.subheading: Work efficently without sacraficing product quality
features.content: Create your own reusable block library for all of your corporate touchpoints.

items.heading: Lightning fast
items.content: Compile your own UI library with Vite at astonishing speeds.

items.heading: Easy to extend
items.content: Use the library you and your team know and love in TailwindCSS.

items.heading: Built-in docs
items.content: Write your documentation right next to your app in the same monorepo.

items.heading: Versioned content
items.content: Manage your content through the same repository as your app in easy-to-use JSON files.
